ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 51
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I will say this much.  I am a lvl 24 Magi and Identify works like this. Hold one of your spell books on the cursor and cast.  It will tell you what lang
ygData.messageBody:
Well I will say this much. I am a lvl 24 Magi and Identify works like this.
Hold one of your spell books on the cursor and cast. It will tell you what
lang you need for that book to read it. Sense summoned I used all the time
in LavaStorm & Najena, Unrest etc. It lets you know if any summoned
creatures are around...this includes pets.


> Also, anyone else notice that FLARE no longer works? That makes what 4
spells that are completly usless to us??
> 1) Identify
> 2) Sense Magic
> 3) Sense Summoned (practically usless in it's current form)
> 4) Flare (since most recent patch)
>
> anyone find any other spells not working at all? or as intended?
>
> Meraxes Glibilskym, Fennin Ro.
>
